perfcenter.baseclass

Class SoftServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • perfcenter.baseclass.QueuingResource
      • perfcenter.baseclass.SoftServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SoftServerAna, SoftServerSim

    public class SoftServer
extends QueuingResource
    Defines server . A server can be deployed on more than one host. Server has set of tasks.
    Author:
    akhila

        void deployVirtResRecursive(Host h,
                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> vrList)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks if softserver has any tasks that require virtual resource. If there are then those virtual resources are deployed on the host
        Parameters:
        h -
        vrList -
        Throws:

                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> vrList)

        java.lang.Exception

      • deployVirtualResOnHost

        public void deployVirtualResOnHost(Host h)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        deploys virtual resource on the host. A virtual resource can call other virtual resources. hence this deployment is done recursively
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • unDeployVirtualResOnHost

        public void unDeployVirtualResOnHost(Host h)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        undeploys virtual resource from the host. A virtual resource can call other virtual resources. hence this undeployment is done recursively
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
